column6:
All Kiden and her friends wanted was to find their missing mentor. But that was before one of their own was shot and the authorities were hunting for them. Without clues, without direction, without hope, will Bobby and Tatiana stand by Kiden in her desperate search...or will they teach her that grownups aren't the only people who can let you down?,2008,12
Parental Advisory ...$3.99
